scenarioText: Two countries must decide whether to sign the Paris agreement which limits global warming (Cooperate) or not (Defect).
Two athletes can choose whether they want to take performance-enhancing drugs (Cooperate) or not (Defect).
Two businesses in an Oligopoly Market Structure can choose whether to keep prices high (Cooperate) or lower them (Defect).
Two countries can decide to sign a nuclear arms agreement (Cooperate) or not (Defect)
